_sText: ------------ gg_portal ------------ a map by jackennils inspired by the game Portal credits to [GGN] Cameron Mitchell for his portal screenshots big thx to all beta testers especially my friends at [GGN] (www.gungame-naps.6x.to) ---------- This GunGame map is something very special. It is made of 4 completely different small maps. These 4 maps are connected via portals like the ones in Portal. Actually I planned to use cameras for the portals, so that the players can see what is happening on the other side. BUT: A silly limitation in the Source engine made it impossible. You can only use one camera per areaportal. So I decided to make some custom textures. Now you can still see what is on the other side, but you don't see the players. Anyway, it's a lot of fun to play the map. Even with only 4 players (max. 32). ---------- working time: ~ 15 hours size: 3,2 mb zipped | 5,5 mb unzipped ---------- more details, screenshots and a highres video can be found here: www.jackennils.6x.to ---------
